snippet: The exhibition “A World of Its Own” uses a range of works from the Museum of Modern Art collection to explore how photographers over the years innovated their styles in the studio.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews photography exhibit A World of Its Own: Photographic Practices in the Studio at Museum of Modern Art.
lead_paragraph: The exhibition “A World of Its Own” uses a range of works from the Museum of Modern Art collection to explore how photographers over the years innovated their styles in the studio.

headline.print_headline: When a Form Is Given Its Room to Play
headline.seo: ‘A World of Its Own,’ Examining Photography, at MoMA
headline.main: When a Form Is Given Its Room to Play
